text:
[Verse]
Dancing in the moonlight
Stars are shining so bright
Feel the rhythm take flight
Everything is alright

[Verse 2]
Feet are moving so fast
Hoping this night will last
Living free no contrast
Moments fly but we grasp

[Chorus]
Oh we dance oh we sway
In the moonlight we play
All our worries away
In this magical way

[Verse 3]
Hands are up in the air
Breathing in the cool air
With our hearts we declare
Night like this is so rare

[Verse 4]
Spinning round in the glow
Let the good times just flow
Joining hearts that we know
Where the wild spirits grow

[Bridge]
Feel the beat in our veins
Lose ourselves in the chains
Of the joy that sustains
Love’s sweet musical strains
title: Dancing in the Moonlight
